name: Evil Purple Robots
description:
Made in 1 week for Brackey's Game Jam 2021 > Controls Move RedRight ClickMove BlueLeft ClickOpen DoorPress Spacebar when the player is on the correct light-padTeleportPress Spacebar when the player is on the correct light-padPausePress Esc > About

Evil Purple Robots is a puzzle game where Red and Blue must work together to save their city from the purple robot infestation. Use pathfinding, teleporters, and doors to avoid being blown to bits by insane robots and other dastardly hazards to reach the end of Level 5 (the last one).

> Lore

Evil robots are scary!

> Planned Updates
  1. Maybe!
  2. If we reach out funding goal of 1 Bitcoin, we will do something.
  3. Might end up on Google Play and Apple AppStore. It's possible.
